ca.mcgill.ecse211.model

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.model.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the methods that directly handle the game parameters retrieved from the game server. That is, depending the team's assigned color, these methods will return the corresponding game parameter for that color. For instance, the getStartingCorner() method will return the RedCorner if the team's color is red and will return the GreenCorner if the team's color is green.
    Author:
    Carlo D'Angelo
